name: Aarjava Welfare Society

address: W2 C(R), 2/3, Phase - IV B, Uday Shankar Sarani, Golfgreen,

briefDescription: Aarjava Welfare Society (AWS) has been mainly working in the field of welfare of street & under privileged children of slums as well as in theatre, art and culture too. But since 2015, Aarjava Welfare Society (AWS) has resolved to focus its work during next five years for the prevention and cure of Thalassaemia in the memory of one of its founder members who passed away in a related disease.
